newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: SLOVAK ISTROBANKA SIGNS 25 MLN MARK, 1-YR LOAN.
newsitem.headline: SLOVAK ISTROBANKA SIGNS 25 MLN MARK, 1-YR LOAN.

text.p: Slovak Istrobanka a.s. said on Thursday it had signed a 25 million MARK, one-year syndicated loan arranged by the London branch of GiroCredit Bank Aktiengesellschaft der Sparkassen.
An Istrobanka statement said the multi-currency facility will be used for pre- and post-export financing for its clients. The bank declined to specify interest rate details of the loan.

The statement added that other syndicate participants include Bayerische Landesbank Girozentrale Munich, Bayerische Vereinsbank AG, Munich, ING Bank Dublin and Westdeutsche Landesbank Girozentrale, London.
